colon.description: Used with `label`, whether to display `:` after label text.
colon.description_zh: 配合 label 属性使用，表示是否显示 label 后面的冒号

extra.description: The extra prompt message. It is similar to help. Usage example: to display error message and prompt message at the same time.
extra.description_zh: 额外的提示信息，和 help 类似，当需要错误信息和提示文案同时出现时，可以使用这个。

hasFeedback.description: Used with `validateStatus`, this option specifies the validation status icon. Recommended to be used only with `Input`.
hasFeedback.description_zh: 配合 validateStatus 属性使用，展示校验状态图标，建议只配合 Input 组件使用

help.description: The prompt message. If not provided, the prompt message will be generated by the validation rule.
help.description_zh: 提示信息，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成

htmlFor.description_zh: 设置子元素 label htmlFor 属性

:labelCol.description: The layout of label. You can set `span offset` to something like `{span: 3, offset: 12}` or `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}` same as with `<Col>`
:labelCol.description_zh: label 标签布局，同 `<Col>` 组件，设置 `span offset` 值，如 `{span: 3, offset: 12}` 或 `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}`

required.description: Whether provided or not, it will be generated by the validation rule.
required.description_zh: 是否必填，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成

validateStatus.description: The validation status. If not provided, it will be generated by validation rule. options: 'success' 'warning' 'error' 'validating'
validateStatus.description_zh: 校验状态，如不设置，则会根据校验规则自动生成，可选：'success' 'warning' 'error' 'validating'

:wrapperCol.description: The layout for input controls, same as `labelCol`
:wrapperCol.description_zh: 需要为输入控件设置布局样式时，使用该属性，用法同 labelCol

selfUpdate.description: Customize the field update logic, you can set it uniformly through the selfUpdate of the Form. When set at the same time as the Form, the Item shall prevail. See below for instructions, you need to 1.3.17 version or above
selfUpdate.description_zh: 自定义字段更新逻辑，你可以通过 Form 的 selfUpdate 进行统一设置。当和 Form 同时设置时，以 Item 为准。 说明见下 需 1.3.17 版本以上
